query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS app_versions (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  version VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  build_number INT NOT NULL,
  release_notes TEXT,
  download_url VARCHAR(500),
  is_force_update BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user mJX9EQK12biUJGd.0c3e5cf8c922 --database XQsH52MNZAyXrU9qYq4MDw --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS app_versions (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  version VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  build_number INT NOT NULL,
  release_notes TEXT,
  download_url VARCHAR(500),
  is_force_update BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
